analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x94ded6923c74b9842ea6c310323d6e411c554284.sol:
	Contract AnicoStableToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x94ded6923c74b9842ea6c310323d6e411c554284.sol#199-200)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x94ded6923c74b9842ea6c310323d6e411c554284.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
